name: pSqlEdit
short_description: pSqlEdit is a handy cross-database front-end client written in Perl/Tk using DBI/DBD. Queries can be entered manually or auto-generated by selecting tables and columns from a tree view browser, and dynamic data entry forms can be created on the fly.
